author: Igor Derysh
title: Meet the scariest Republican candidates of 2022: It wasn't easy to pick 'em

sentence: He's not a real big digital guy, so we had printouts,? said Joe Kent, who has since won Mr. Trump's backing for his effort to unseat Representative Jaime Herrera Beutler of Washington, one of the 10 Republican impeachment votes.
title: Mar-a-Lago Machine: Trump as a Modern-Day Party Boss

sentence: "He's not a real big digital guy, so we had printouts," Trump-endorsed House GOP candidate Joe Kent told The Times.
author: Jake Lahut
title: Republican candidates seeking Trump's endorsement need to show him 'printouts' with 'big' fonts: 'He's not a real big digital guy'
